Title: A New Method Using LLMs for Keypoints Generation in Qualitative Data Analysis
Abstract: qualitative data analysis  qda  is useful for identifying patterns themes and relationships among data. in this paper we propose a new method that uses large language models  large language model  such as gpt based models to improve qda in ecological momentary assessment  ema  studies as an example by automating keypoints extraction and relevance evaluation. experimental results on the ibm argkp 2021 dataset show improved performance of the new method over existing work achieving higher accuracy while reducing time and effort in the coding process of qda and demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed method in various application settings.
